snippet: The video game publisher accused the social gaming company of copying crucial elements of its Sims Social game for Zynga’s own title, The Ville.
abstract: Video game publisher Electronic Arts sues Zynga, accusing the social gaming company of copying crucial elements of its Sims Social game for Zynga’s own title, The Ville.
lead_paragraph: The video game publisher accused the social gaming company of copying crucial elements of its Sims Social game for Zynga’s own title, The Ville.

headline.main: Electronic Arts Accuses Zynga of Copying Game Traits
headline.print_headline: Electronic Arts Accuses Zynga of Copying Game Traits
